title: Price drop: Joss (pitching), Polar Bear, SGC 5
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: Price drop: Joss (pitching), Polar Bear, SGC 5
posts.post_content:
SGC 60 (5). Looks more like a 4, but you can see that for yourself. Still, no wrinkles or creases. A bit of wear at each of the corners. Wet sheet transfer of the PB back is visible around the right and bottom borders; it's more apparent in hand than in the scan.

[STRIKE]$350[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$325[/STRIKE] $300
